statements: SELECT * FROM therapy_billing;
SELECT therapy_billing_id, client_id, therapist_id, service_date, service_cost FROM therapy_billing;
SELECT therapy_billing_id, service_date, service_cost FROM therapy_billing WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT therapist_id, service_cost FROM therapy_billing WHERE service_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT client_id, therapist_id FROM therapy_billing WHERE service_cost > 100.00 ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapy_billing WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT therapy_billing_id, service_cost FROM therapy_billing ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, therapist_id, SUM(service_cost) AS total_cost FROM therapy_billing GROUP BY client_id, therapist_id;
SELECT * FROM therapy_billing WHERE service_cost > 1000 ORDER BY service_cost ASC, service_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, AVG(service_cost) AS average_cost FROM therapy_billing GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING AVG(service_cost) > 500;
SELECT * FROM therapy_clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM therapy_clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, amount FROM therapy_invoices WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT client_name, invoice_date FROM therapy_clients JOIN therapy_invoices ON therapy_clients.client_id = therapy_invoices.client_id;
SELECT client_name, invoice_date, amount FROM therapy_clients JOIN therapy_invoices ON therapy_clients.client_id = therapy_invoices.client_id WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM therapy_clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM therapy_clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT tc.client_name, ti.invoice_date, ti.amount FROM therapy_clients tc JOIN therapy_invoices ti ON tc.client_id = ti.client_id;
SELECT tc.client_name, COUNT(ti.invoice_id) AS num_invoices FROM therapy_clients tc LEFT JOIN therapy_invoices ti ON tc.client_id = ti.client_id GROUP BY tc.client_name;
SELECT tc.client_name, ti.invoice_date FROM therapy_clients tc JOIN therapy_invoices ti ON tc.client_id = ti.client_id WHERE ti.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM therapy_clients;
SELECT name, email FROM therapy_clients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT client_id, email FROM therapy_clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM therapy_services WHERE service_rate > 50;
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_rate FROM therapy_services ORDER BY service_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM therapy_clients;
SELECT name, email FROM therapy_clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_rate FROM therapy_services WHERE service_id > 5 ORDER BY service_rate DESC;
SELECT client_id, service_name, invoice_date FROM therapy_invoices WHERE total_amount >= 100 ORDER BY invoice_date ASC;

SELECT client_id, service_name, total_amount FROM therapy_invoices JOIN therapy_services ON therapy_invoices.service_id = therapy_services.service_id WHERE service_rate < 50 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, therapy_type FROM clients WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM invoices ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT therapy_type, therapist_name FROM clients INNER JOIN therapists ON clients.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id;

SELECT client_name, therapist_name, invoice_date FROM clients JOIN therapists ON clients.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id JOIN invoices ON clients.client_id = invoices.client_id WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id = 3;
SELECT client_name, therapist_id FROM clients WHERE therapy_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE therapist_id = 2 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(total_amount) AS min_amount FROM invoices;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM Clients WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM Therapists ORDER BY therapist_id DESC;
SELECT service_name, cost FROM Services WHERE cost > 50.00;
SELECT client_id, therapist_id, service_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM Therapists WHERE specialization = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT client_name, address, phone_number FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, cost FROM Services ORDER BY cost DESC;

SELECT client_name, therapist_name, appointment_date, start_time, end_time FROM Clients INNER JOIN Appointments ON Clients.client_id = Appointments.client_id INNER JOIN Therapists ON Appointments.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, start_time DESC;
